inputParams.label: Supervisor Prompt
inputParams.name: supervisorPrompt
inputParams.default:
You are a supervisor tasked with managing a conversation between the following workers: {team_members}.
Given the following user request, respond with the worker to act next.
Each worker will perform a task and respond with their results and status.
When finished, respond with FINISH.
Select strategically to minimize the number of steps taken.

inputParams.label: Summarization
inputParams.name: summarization
inputParams.description: Return final output as a summarization of the conversation

inputParams.label: Recursion Limit
inputParams.name: recursionLimit
inputParams.description: Maximum number of times a call can recurse. If not provided, defaults to 100.

inputAnchors.label: Tool Calling Chat Model
inputAnchors.name: model
inputAnchors.description: Only compatible with models that are capable of function calling: ChatOpenAI, ChatMistral, ChatAnthropic, ChatGoogleGenerativeAI, GroqChat. Best result with GPT-4 model

inputAnchors.label: Agent Memory
inputAnchors.name: agentMemory
inputAnchors.description: Save the state of the agent

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputs.supervisorPrompt:
You are a supervisor tasked with managing a conversation between the following workers: {team_members}.
Given the following user request, respond with the worker to act next.
Each worker will perform a task and respond with their results and status.
When finished, respond with FINISH.
Select strategically to minimize the number of steps taken.


# Tasks

- If the user asks about drug availability, engage only the "Stock" worker.
- If the user’s request is solely about the price, engage only the "Price Check" worker.
- If the user requests to place an order or to add items to a queue, use the "Provider" worker.

data.label: ChatOpenAI
data.name: chatOpenAI
data.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Strict Tool Calling
inputParams.name: strictToolCalling
inputParams.description: Whether the model supports the `strict` argument when passing in tools. If not specified, the `strict` argument will not be passed to OpenAI.

inputParams.label: Stop Sequence
inputParams.name: stopSequence
inputParams.description: List of stop words to use when generating. Use comma to separate multiple stop words.

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Allow image input. Refer to the docs for more details.

inputParams.label: Image Resolution
inputParams.description: This parameter controls the resolution in which the model views the image.
inputParams.name: imageResolution

inputParams.label: Reasoning Effort
inputParams.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models. Only applicable for o1 models
inputParams.name: reasoningEffort

outputAnchors.name: chatOpenAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatOpenAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Worker Prompt
inputParams.name: workerPrompt
inputParams.default: You are a research assistant who can search for up-to-date info using search engine.

inputAnchors.label: Tool Calling Chat Model
inputAnchors.name: model
inputAnchors.description: Only compatible with models that are capable of function calling: ChatOpenAI, ChatMistral, ChatAnthropic, ChatGoogleGenerativeAI, ChatVertexAI, GroqChat. If not specified, supervisor's model will be used

inputs.workerPrompt:
# Role
You are a helpful assistant whose main task is to check item availability in the pharmacy. You have access to a tool named "pharmaceticual" that shows which items are currently in stock.

# Tasks
- When a user asks if an item is available, look up the availability with your tool.
- If the item exists and is in stock, provide the user with additional options, such as available forms (e.g., tablet, capsule) and strengths and don't offer any more information.
- If the item does not exist or is out of stock, inform the user politely and suggest that they can ask for alternatives or check back later.
- Please don't add any sentences like "If you need more information or alternatives, feel free to ask!" at the end of the conversation.

inputParams.label: Worker Prompt
inputParams.name: workerPrompt
inputParams.default: You are a research assistant who can search for up-to-date info using search engine.

inputAnchors.label: Tool Calling Chat Model
inputAnchors.name: model
inputAnchors.description: Only compatible with models that are capable of function calling: ChatOpenAI, ChatMistral, ChatAnthropic, ChatGoogleGenerativeAI, ChatVertexAI, GroqChat. If not specified, supervisor's model will be used

inputs.workerPrompt:
# Role
You are a helpful assistant whose main task is to provide pricing information for pharmacy items. You have access to a search engine containing the prices of each item in stock.


 # Tasks
- When the user asks for the price of an item, look it up using the available data.
- If the item price is found, provide it clearly and politely.
- If the price is not found, politely let the user know you are unable to find the information.
- If you do not have enough information, politely inform the user and provide a next step (e.g., suggest they contact the pharmacy directly).

data.label: Retriever Tool
data.name: retrieverTool
data.description: Use a retriever as allowed tool for agent

inputParams.label: Retriever Description
inputParams.name: description
inputParams.description: When should agent uses to retrieve documents
inputParams.placeholder: Searches and returns documents regarding the state-of-the-union.

inputParams.label: Additional Metadata Filter
inputParams.name: retrieverToolMetadataFilter
inputParams.description: Add additional metadata filter on top of the existing filter from vector store

hint.label: What can you filter?
hint.value:
Add additional filters to vector store. You can also filter with flow config, including the current "state":
- `$flow.sessionId`
- `$flow.chatId`
- `$flow.chatflowId`
- `$flow.input`
- `$flow.state`

inputs.name: pharmaceticual
inputs.description: Returns the document related to List of drugs with their Strength.

outputAnchors.name: retrieverTool
outputAnchors.label: RetrieverTool
outputAnchors.description: Use a retriever as allowed tool for agent

inputParams.default: You are a research assistant who can search for up-to-date info using search engine.

inputAnchors.label: Tool Calling Chat Model
inputAnchors.name: model

inputs.workerPrompt:
# Role
You are a helpful assistant that provides additional information about drugs, such as their pros and cons. You can use a search engine or database to gather relevant details.


# Instructions:
- When the user asks about a drug’s advantages, disadvantages, or side effects, gather the information from reliable sources.

- Present the pros (benefits, typical uses) and cons (side effects, warnings, contraindications) in a clear, balanced manner.

- If you cannot find relevant details, politely inform the user.

- Provide a disclaimer when appropriate, reminding users to consult a healthcare professional for personalised advice.

data.label: Chatflow Tool
data.name: ChatflowTool
data.description: Use as a tool to execute another chatflow

inputParams.label: Tool Description
inputParams.name: description
inputParams.description: Description of what the tool does. This is for LLM to determine when to use this tool.
inputParams.placeholder: State of the Union QA - useful for when you need to ask questions about the most recent state of the union address.

inputParams.label: Override Config
inputParams.name: overrideConfig
inputParams.description: Override the config passed to the Chatflow.

inputParams.label: Base URL
inputParams.name: baseURL
inputParams.description: Base URL to Flowise. By default, it is the URL of the incoming request. Useful when you need to execute the Chatflow through an alternative route.

inputParams.label: Start new session per message
inputParams.name: startNewSession
inputParams.description: Whether to continue the session with the Chatflow tool or start a new one with each interaction. Useful for Chatflows with memory if you want to avoid it.

inputParams.label: Use Question from Chat
inputParams.name: useQuestionFromChat
inputParams.description: Whether to use the question from the chat as input to the chatflow. If turned on, this will override the custom input.

inputParams.label: Custom Input
inputParams.name: customInput
inputParams.description: Custom input to be passed to the chatflow. Leave empty to let LLM decides the input.

inputs.name: Determiner
inputs.description: Use this tool to validate the drug for the user based on standard medical guidelines and provide a clear recommendation on whether the patient can safely use this drug.

outputAnchors.name: ChatflowTool
outputAnchors.label: ChatflowTool
outputAnchors.description: Use as a tool to execute another chatflow

inputs.workerPrompt:
You are a Provider that wants to get all the items from the user and use your tool named "Queue" to put them all in a queue.
As the tool needs an input named `items`, when you want to call your tool, give it the list of items as `items`.
After calling the "Queue" tool, let the user know which items were successfully added.
